attributes.name: PLATFORM
attributes.description: the platform name, i.e. twitch_account

attributes.name: TYPE
attributes.description: the type of event on the platform, i.e. subscription

attributes.name: ID
attributes.description: a unique id GUID for this event instance, i.e. baa1dfda864791479bc70d0403f34ec2

attributes.name: VALUETYPE
attributes.description: which group the event is in out of: money, follow, viewer

attributes.name: VALUE
attributes.description: a normalised number for the event: money in USD, for follower and viewer is the counts

attributes.name: MODVALUE
attributes.description: Action only - an optional calculated value generated by the manipulator script that is only available in the action script.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: the display name of the user who did the event

attributes.name: amount
attributes.description: the amount of the donation with a variable (0-10) number of decimal places

attributes.name: formatted_amount
attributes.description: the amount as 2 decimal places and the currancy symbol

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: the text message with the donation

attributes.name: currency
attributes.description: the 3 letter currance code, i.e. USD, GBP

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: the username of the person who did the event

attributes.name: display_name
attributes.description: the display name of the person who did the event

attributes.name: months
attributes.description: number of months this user has been subscribed for in a row

attributes.name: message
attributes.description: the text message with the subscription

attributes.name: sub_plan
attributes.description: the number twitch uses to identify each sub tier: Prime, 1000, 2000, 3000

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: the username of the person who received the subscription

attributes.name: display_name
attributes.description: the display name of the person who received the subscription
